body_html:
@suharshs As you pointed out, a more comprehensive documentation could be of great help.
Especially, a full example showing:

  • training_graph quantization + exporting/displaying weights/activations already quantized
  • evaluation_graph quantization + exporting/displaying weights/activations already quantized

would be of great help, allowing us developers to access and debug the layers and check whether the quantization is being correctly performed.

Thanks
body_text:
@suharshs As you pointed out, a more comprehensive documentation could be of great help.
Especially, a full example showing:

training_graph quantization +  exporting/displaying  weights/activations already quantized
evaluation_graph quantization + exporting/displaying weights/activations already quantized

would be of great help, allowing us developers to access and debug the layers and check whether the quantization is being correctly performed.
Thanks
body:
@suharshs As you pointed out, a more comprehensive documentation could be of great help.
Especially, a full example showing:

- training_graph quantization +  **exporting/displaying  weights/activations already quantized** 
- evaluation_graph quantization + **exporting/displaying weights/activations already quantized**

would be of great help, allowing us developers to access and debug the layers and check whether the quantization is being correctly performed.

Thanks
